product.title: Anthology (Blackout) Fired Earth - Roller Blind
product.description: Fired earth is more than a blackout blind that allows you to drift off the moment your head hits the pillow. It's a symphony of exotic hues that holds the keys to unlocking the full potential of your interiors. The reds and oranges are finely tempered by the strands of white that intricately weave their way through the fabric. Combine fired earth with some terracotta whenever the option presents itself and you won't be disappointed.
